file.name: naming.php
file.violation: Constant nonUppercaseName should be defined in uppercase
Avoid variables with short names like $_a
Avoid excessively long variable names like $_tooLongPropertyName1
Classes should not have a constructor method with the same name as the class
Avoid variables with short names like $a1
Avoid excessively long variable names like $tooLongParameterName2
Avoid variables with short names like $a2
Avoid excessively long variable names like $tooLongLocalVariable3
Avoid using short method names like Foo::_x()
The 'getBoolValue()' method which returns a boolean should be named 'is...()' or 'has...()'
